description.narrative: The Project will reconstruct 4 bridges and rehabilitate 30 km of local roads in the Ganja-Qazax region. All 4 bridges are in a very poor, nearly no longer maintable condition.

participating-org.narrative: State Agency of Azerbaijan Automobile Roads

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, and sustainable road network in the Ganja region of Azerbaijan.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
5% reduction in Road traffic deaths per 100,000 population (2010 baseline: 10.2).

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, and sustainable road network in the Ganja region of Azerbaijan.

title.narrative: 5% increase in passenger traffic (Baseline: 10,892 million passenger-km in 2005).

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, and sustainable road network in the Ganja region of Azerbaijan.

title.narrative: 2% reduction in road traffic crashes(Baseline: 3,179 in 2005).

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, and sustainable road network in the Ganja region of Azerbaijan.

title.narrative: Increased funding for road maintenance to $250 million and maintaining at over $150 million (Baseline: $55 million in 2006).

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, and sustainable road network in the Ganja region of Azerbaijan.

title.narrative: 10% increased freight traffic (Baseline: 7,536 million ton-km in 2005).

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, and sustainable road network in the Ganja region of Azerbaijan.
